title: Rasen no Meikyu: DNA Kagaku Sosa
overview: Jin Jinbo is a DNA expert. He works as an associate professor of genome analysis laboratory at a medical school. A murder case takes place in Tokyo. The murderer left an 'X' mark on the dead body. Detective Genji Ando is excluded from the murder investigation, because of a high probability that his wife was murdered by the same person. The investigation headquarters secretly reaches out to Jin Jinbo for help.
